actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To amend section 201 of title 18, United States Code, to redefine the term "official act" in bribery cases involving public officials to strengthen accountability and oversight.
short_title: Upholding the Integrity of Public Officials Act of 2021
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text:
Upholding the Integrity of Public Officials Act of 2021

This bill broadens the scope of conduct that qualifies as an official act for purposes of federal criminal offenses involving bribes or illegal gratuities offered to or received by public officials.

titles.title: Upholding the Integrity of Public Officials Act of 2021
To amend section 201 of title 18, United States Code, to redefine the term "official act" in bribery cases involving public officials to strengthen accountability and oversight.
Upholding the Integrity of Public Officials Act of 2021
